item.title: Laravel 8 Add Custom Class Facades
item.description: So, you are having a good time crafting your application using Laravel. Not just that, you keep using the facade feature of existing classes. As your application grows, somewhere in the timeline you will need to integrate custom services. However… The facade feature has been convenient to you, so how do we turn our custom classes into facade? Laravel, to the rescue! (again) Laravel is an extensible framework allowing you to plug in and out, disable here and there, configure now and then.
